ygData.subject: Re: Bidl Frugrin Location Confirmed
ygData.msgSnippet: Might be waiting for the next scheduled downtime to implement the changes since they seem to affect gameplay greatly. If a patch has something that you MUST
ygData.messageBody:
Might be waiting for the next scheduled downtime to implement the changes since
they seem to affect gameplay greatly. If a patch has something that you MUST
have in order to play, then they need to implement it when the servers are down.
This means server downtime or waiting until the scheduled downtime. Just giving
it from a programmer's viewpoint :) I really have no idea why they haven't
patched it all in yet, but this could be why...
-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM

Joshua Bednarz wrote:

> From: "Joshua Bednarz" <thewhitemage@...>
>
> That could be the case, but it's not becuase they are not making changes to
> the previous changes that they made becuade they didn't work. They are just
> adding new patches with new changes completely different from the last
> patch.
>
> >They arn't patching the test server because they "care" more about the test
> >server... as the name "Test" implies, it is a sever used for testing knew
> >and updated source code... Most everything that is altered and/or added
> >passes through the test server first... So is understandable that there
> >will be multiple patches on the test server. Once they get it right, they
> >dont need to patch more then once with the regular servers...
> >Wes Lobdell,
> >Quote: "The certain proof that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the
> >universe
> >is that no one has bothered to make contact with us."
